description:
This is a market on whether President Biden will say “folks” during his first joint address to Congress, scheduled to take place on April 28, 2021. This market will resolve to “Yes” if President Biden says “folks” in his first Joint Address, and “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market will be the official transcript of the joint address, as published by an official White House source (https://www.whitehouse.gov/briefing-room/speeches-remarks/). This market will resolve after an official transcript of the address is published.

Update: In response to trader inquiry, this market will resolve on April 29, 2021, 9 PM ET according to the transcript published by the resolution source (whitehouse.gov) that most accurately reflects the speech as delivered by President Biden.
